uk.ac.gla.dcs.tp3.w.league
Class League

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.gla.dcs.tp3.w.league.League

public class League
extends java.lang.Object

This class has two members: an array of teams; and an array of fixtures. The primary purpose of this class is to maintain, and keep track of, progress through a given sports league.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Team W

getTeams

getFixtures

public Match[] getFixtures()

setFixtures

public void setFixtures(Match[] fixtures)

addFixture

public void addFixture(Match m)
Adds given match into the fixture array if not currently in the array. Also, if the match has not been played, calls the appropriate Team method to add the match to the upcoming match array for the associated teams.

Parameters:
m - The match to add to the fixture list.

addTeam

public void addTeam(Team t)
Adds given team into the team array if not currently in the array.

Parameters:
t - The team to be added to the team array.
